minisite_config._comment1: Edit this JSON file and locate it under a folder uploads_ministe with a descriptive name. The folder should be created at the top level.
minisite_config._comment2: Assuming the public_id of the JSON is https://greatbiz-res.cloudinary.com/raw/upload/uploads_minisite/agencies/best-one.json
minisite_config._comment3: then the upload minisite would be available at https://upload-minisite.cloudinary.us/greatbiz/agencies/best-one
minisite_config._troubleshooting1: Put the JSON URL in a web browser and make sure you that is is fetched
minisite_config._troubleshooting2: Make sure you are using images (backgroundImage, opengraphImage) from your own environment only
